Description:
Develop an end-to-end product vision and articulate a clear and ambitious product strategy for digital landscape, aligned with the overall business goals and objectives.
Lead the product development lifecycle, from concept to launch, ensuring timely delivery of features and functionalities that enhance user experiences.
Create and manage a comprehensive product roadmap, aligning it with business priorities and customer needs.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including UX/UI, engineering, marketing, and data analytics, IT and Development teams to define and prioritize product features.
Champion customer-centric design principles to optimize the user experience across all digital touchpoints.
Use data and user feedback to identify areas for improvement and implement A/B testing strategies.
Establish KPIs and metrics to measure the success and impact of product initiatives, providing regular reports to stakeholders.
Monitor product performance and identify areas for optimization.
Foster a culture of innovation, constantly exploring new ways to enhance our consumer-oriented products and improve the overall consumer experience.
Provide guidance, support, and professional development opportunities to ensure the team's continuous growth and success.
Collaborate with senior management and cross-functional teams to ensure alignment of product strategies with overall business objectives.
Effectively communicate product updates, progress, and challenges to key stakeholders at regular intervals
Stay updated with latest trends, competitive landscapes, and emerging technologies to identify opportunities for continuous improvement and innovationJob Details
